name: lint-fix
description: Runs linters and auto-formatters across the entire monorepo. Use before committing or when code style issues are detected.
steps: Lint and fix TypeScript/JavaScript files via ESLint
Lint Python files via ruff (if installed)
commands: cd apps/api && uv run ruff check --fix app/ || true
cd apps/api && uv run ruff format app/ || true
